mapper.sql: store_id, item_id, item, transaction_summary_id, inventory_type_id, po_header_id, specific_id, warehouse, net_weight_per_unit, net_weight, gross_weight, piece_num, create_transaction_id, update_transaction_id, remarks, created_by, created_date, last_updated_by, last_updated_date, organization_id
mapper.select:
select GROUP_CONCAT(store_id SEPARATOR ',') as store_ids,ms.item_id,ms.item,ms.specific_id,net_weight_per_unit, sum(ms.net_weight) as net_weight,sum(ms.piece_num) as piece_num,ms.warehouse,max(ms.created_date) as created_date,ms.organization_id, (select ds.dict_data_name from sys_dict_datas ds where ds.id = ms.specific_id and ds.organization_id = ms.organization_id and ds.dict_id = 3) as specificName, (select ds.dict_data_name from sys_dict_datas ds where ds.dict_data_code = ms.warehouse and ds.organization_id = ms.organization_id and ds.dict_id = 1) as warehouseName, (select ds.dict_data_name from sys_dict_datas ds where ds.id = ms.inventory_type_id and ds.organization_id = ms.organization_id and ds.dict_id = 9) as inventoryType from material_storeage ms
group by ms.item_id,ms.item,ms.specific_id,ms.warehouse,ms.inventory_type_id,net_weight_per_unit,ms.organization_id
mapper.insert: insert into material_storeage (store_id, item_id, item, transaction_summary_id, inventory_type_id, po_header_id, specific_id, warehouse, net_weight_per_unit, net_weight, gross_weight, piece_num, create_transaction_id, update_transaction_id, remarks, created_by, created_date, last_updated_by, last_updated_date, organization_id ) values (#{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transactionSummaryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{inventoryTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{poHeaderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{specificId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netWeightPerUnit,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{netWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{grossWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pieceNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTransactionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTransactionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )

store_id,

item,

mapper.update:
update material_storeage
item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
item = #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transaction_summary_id = #{transactionSummaryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
inventory_type_id = #{inventoryTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
po_header_id = #{poHeaderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
specific_id = #{specificId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
warehouse = #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
net_weight_per_unit = #{netWeightPerUnit,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
net_weight = #{netWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
gross_weight = #{grossWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
piece_num = #{pieceNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_transaction_id = #{createTransactionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_transaction_id = #{updateTransactionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_updated_date = #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update material_storeage set item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, item = #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transaction_summary_id = #{transactionSummaryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, inventory_type_id = #{inventoryTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, po_header_id = #{poHeaderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, specific_id = #{specificId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, warehouse = #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, net_weight_per_unit = #{netWeightPerUnit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, net_weight = #{netWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gross_weight = #{grossWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, piece_num = #{pieceNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_transaction_id = #{createTransactionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_transaction_id = #{updateTransactionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_updated_date = #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
